content.p: You can apply directly through our online system, NottinghamHub. There is an application fee of Â£50 for postgraduate taught courses and MRes courses. Apply online You can log in at any time to track the progress of your application. When we have made a decision, we will email you to let you know what you need to do next. Track your application Places are limited and courses may become full so we encourage you to apply as early as possible. Some courses have earlier deadlines, due to availability or funding requirements, as detailed on our course pages. Make sure to change the 'Year of entry' option to '2025' then click 'Apply filters' to view these courses. Standard application deadlines 4 August 2025 25 August 2025 1 October 2025 18 August 2025 15 September 2025 Places are limited and courses may become full so we encourage you to apply as early as possible. Some courses have earlier deadlines, due to availability or funding requirements, as detailed on our course pages. Make sure to change the 'Year of entry' option to '2024' then click 'Apply filters' to view these courses. 5 August 2024 26 August 2024 1 October 2024 19 August 2024 16 September 2024 Please note that if an application fee is required, your application will not be considered as fully submitted until this fee has been paid and processed. For postgraduate courses starting on other dates during the year, the application deadline is typically six weeks before the course start date. Some courses will have start dates outside of the standard dates above. If they do, these will be listed on the course pages.
